inlinecomments-addcomment-tooltip: If you highlight text on a page, a speech bubble icon appears to allow the user to add a comment by clicking on the icon. If they hover over this icon, this message is the tooltip shown
inlinecomments-addcomment-save: Text of submit button shown when adding a new comment
inlinecomments-addcomment-cancel: Text of button to cancel adding a new inline comment
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-pre: {{doc-apihelp-param|inlinecomments-add|pre}} apihelp for prefix before selected text
inlinecomments-invaliditem: Api error if annotation being added is not valid
inlinecomments-editsummary-add: Edit summary when you add an annotation. $1 is the first bit of the added comment
inlinecomments-editsummary-resolve: Edit summary when you mark a comment resolved
inlinecomments-editsummary-addreply: Edit summary when you reply to a comment
inlinecomments-addcomment-reply: Text of button to reply to a comment
inlinecomments-addcomment-resolve: Text of button to mark the comment resolved
inlinecomments-placeholder: Placeholder for text box where you type in your comment
inlinecomments-missingpage: Error if you tried to comment on a page that doesn't exist
inlinecomments-noitembyid: Error message if user tries to resolve a comment that does not exist
inlinecomments-addcomment-noitembyid: Error message if the user tries to resolve a comment that does not exist.
